Name: Alignment
About the game: ALIGNMENT is a challenging and engaging puzzle game that will put your logical reasoning skills to the test. By moving colored objects and placing them on their respective platforms, you will explore through a series of increasingly complex levels. With an average playtime of 1 hour, this game will challenge your ability to piece together various systems as you progress. ENDINGS: Your journey towards success will determine a specific and unique conclusion. Can you piece together clues and uncover all 5 possible endings? ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- THIS IS A CHALLENGING GAME: Alignment serves as a way to challenge your proficiency in unraveling complex and enigmatic systems and puzzles. By identifying patterns within the puzzles, you can gain a deeper insight into the system and establish a solid understanding of its underlying principles.
